TEXT.TITLE: FORD <F> MAY CAR OUTPUT UP 2.2 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Ford Motor Co said its May North American car production rose 2.2 pct to 213,790 from 209,109 last year. The company said its May truck production eased 4.7 pct to 140,696 from 147,638 a year ago. Reuter
